objects.definition: A laboratory within which ex situ analysis of of environmental samples is performed.
objects.name: Analytical laboratory

objects.definition: A group of persons associated for a common purpose.
objects.name: Association

objects.definition: A place where some function or activity occurs.
objects.name: Center

objects.definition: An institution of higher education.
objects.name: College

objects.definition: An business entity that provides services.
objects.name: Company

objects.definition: An association of individuals or organizations for the purpose of engaging in a joint venture.
objects.name: Consortium

objects.definition: A subdivision or unit within a university, institution, or agency.
objects.name: Department

objects.definition: A section of a large company, agency, or organization.
objects.name: Division

objects.definition: An organization whose values are based on faith and/or beliefs, which has a mission based on social values of the particular faith, and which most often draws its activists (leaders, staff, volunteers) from a particular faith group.
objects.name: Faith-based organization

objects.definition: An institution or organization supported by a donation or legacy appropriation.
objects.name: Foundation

objects.definition: An organization that funds research or creative works.
objects.name: Funding organization

objects.definition: A department or other administrative unit of a government.
objects.name: Government agency

objects.definition: An organization founded to promote a cause.
objects.name: Institute

objects.definition: A room, building, or institution equipped for scientific research, experimentation, or analysis.
objects.name: Laboratory

objects.definition: An institution that holds books and or other forms of stored information for use by the public or other experts.
objects.name: Library

objects.definition: A person or company that makes a product.
objects.name: Manufacturer

objects.definition: A building or institution dedicated to the acquisition, conservation, study, exhibition, and educational interpretation of objects having scientific, historical, cultural, or artistic value.
objects.name: Museum

objects.definition: An organization that promotes outdoor exploration, provides nature education, and or fosters appreciation and stewardship of the natural world.
objects.name: Nature center

objects.definition: An organization dedicated to furthering a particular social cause or advocating for a shared point of view. In economic terms, it is an organization that uses its surplus of revenues to further achieve its ultimate objective, rather than distributing its income to the organization's shareholders, leaders, or members. Non-profits are tax exempt or charitable, meaning they do not pay income tax on the money that they receive for their organization. They can operate in religious, scientific, research, or educational settings.
objects.name: Non-profit organization

objects.definition: An organization that operates federal, state, county, or municipal parks.
objects.name: Park

objects.definition: A set of structured activities.
objects.name: Program

objects.definition: An organization that publishes data.
objects.name: Publisher

objects.definition: A department or other administrative unit of a government with the express purpose of conducting research.
objects.name: Research agency

objects.definition: An organization founded to conduct research.
objects.name: Research institute

objects.definition: A group of cooperating researchers.
objects.name: Research organization

objects.definition: An educational institution providing primary education.
objects.name: School primary

objects.definition: An educational institution providing secondary education.
objects.name: School secondary

objects.definition: A group of students who associate for a particular purpose.
objects.name: Student organization

objects.definition: An institution of higher education.
objects.name: University

objects.definition: The organization type is unknown.
objects.name: Unknown

objects.definition: A person or company that sells a product.
objects.name: Vendor

objects.definition: A group of young people that meet and participate in a variety of activities.
objects.name: Youth group
